kpi.name: M1000C268

kpi_info.title: BTS HSUPA NOT HW LIMITED DURATION
kpi_info.use: This counter indicates how long time the BTS local cell group HW pool where this cell belongs, is in HSUPA HW not-limited state during the measurement period. In this state the BTS HW does not limit the HSUPA throughput.The same counter value is updated for all HSUPA enabled cells in the local cell group. At 1-second intervals with value 1 when BTS has reported with RADIO RESOURCE MEASUREMENT REPORT to be in state where HW does not limit the usage of E-DCH.

kpi.kpi_alias: BTS HSUPA NOT HW LIMITED DURATION
